item.description:
Hi Seacoast Energy members, will be showing a movie called: Solar energy: saved by the sun, this is a: NOVA video presentation showing a provocative mix of scientists, economists, and ordinary citizens who are all pushing the envelope of solar power's untapped potential"-

We will be discussing the contents of the movie after the show.

Also will explain how I built my home (built it all by myself) and the benifits on building your own energy efficient home.

Also will show my full enclosed motorcycle which gets 60 mpg.

Also will be building a "dome" in the near future and looking for people who would like to help build one.

Will be discussing future workshops and classes on how to build your own hotwater heaters for under $100.

See you there.

Peter
item.name: Solar Energy Night
